```{asis, echo = {{proj_mess_knit}}, eval = {{proj_mess_knit}}, include = {{proj_mess_knit}}}
Generate a MESS map for the projection variables given the variables used for modelling
```

```{r, echo = {{proj_mess_knit}}, include = {{proj_mess_knit}}}
# R code to generate MESS raster
projMess_{{spAbr}} <- proj_mess(
  occs = occs_{{spAbr}},
  bg = bgEnvsVals_{{spAbr}} ,
  bgMsk =  bgMask_{{spAbr}},
  projExtRas =  projExt_{{spAbr}} ,
  time = "{{time_rmd}}")

```
